Post._content:
## 


## 
* nodejs,npm
* git
* github,

## 
``` bash
node_modules
public
scaffolds
source
themes
_config.yml
db.jsonsource
package.json
```

## 

### (./source)

``` bash
$ hexo new "build-blog"
```
## github 
githubproject,:.github.io(eg:acmwln.github.io)

## HexoHexo

```bash
mkdir wangln_website # wangln_website
npm install -g hexo #hexo
 cd wangln_website
hexo init #hexo
hexo server #,4000
hexo clean #
hexo generate  # hexo g
hexo publish #
hexo delopy # hexo d
```

 localhost:4000 

## Github

wangln_website_config.yml 

```bash
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com//.github.io.git  ##eg.https://github.com/acmwln/acmwln.github.io.git
  branch: master
  message: blog

```

##  hexo-deployer-git
```bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save # hexo-deployer-git, GitHub 
hexo clean #
hexo generate  # hexo g
hexo delopy #, hexo  GitHub , hexo d

```

 https://.github.io(eg:https://acmwln.github.io)

## cookie ```javascript function setCookie(json,time){ var date = new Date(new Date().getTime()+time*24*60*60*1000).toUTCString(); for(var key in json){ document.cookie = key+"="+json[key]+";expires="+date } } setCookie({ name:'wanglina', sex:'female' },7); ``` ## cookie ```javascript function getCookie(attr){ return document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+attr+"=([^;]+)(;|$)")) } ``` ## cookie ```javascript function removeCookie(attr){ var json = {}; json[attr] = ""; setCookie(json,-1) } ``` ## javascriptcookie `navigator.cookieEnabled` `cookie``true``cookie``false` `navigator` `JavaScript``navigator` ## javascriptcookie 1.HttpOnly cookieHttpOnlyjscookieXSS 2.HttpOnly ```javascript response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "cookiename=value;Path=/;Domain=domainvalue;Max-Age=seconds;HTTPOnly"); ``` ```bash //httpcookie response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "uid=112; Path=/; HttpOnly"); ``` ```bash //httpscookie response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "uid=112; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly"); ``` ## WebStorage `WebStorage``cookie` #### WebStorage 1.`cookie` 2. `HTML5``WebStorage``API``localStorage``sessionStorage` ### localStoragesessionStorage ##### 1. `localStorage``localStorage``localStorage` `sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage` ##### 2. `localStorage``sessionStorage`5MB ##### 3. `localStorage``sessionStorage` ##### 4. `localStorage``sessionStorage``ECMAScript``JSON``stringify``parse` ##### 5. ```bash localStoragewindow.localStorage sessionStoragewindow.sessionStorage ``` ##### 6. `localStorage`+ `sessionStorage` ## WebStorage - `cookie`4KB`WebStorage`5MB - `WebStorage``cookie` - `sessionStorage` - `WebStorage` - `WebStorage``HTTP header``cookie` - `WebStorage``cookie` ```bash setItem(key, value) getItem(key) value removeItem(key) clear() key(index) key ```

## cookie ```javascript function setCookie(json,time){ var date = new Date(new Date().getTime()+time*24*60*60*1000).toUTCString(); for(var key in json){ document.cookie = key+"="+json[key]+";expires="+date } } setCookie({ name:'wanglina', sex:'female' },7); ``` ## cookie ```javascript function getCookie(attr){ return document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+attr+"=([^;]+)(;|$)")) } ``` ## cookie ```javascript function removeCookie(attr){ var json = {}; json[attr] = ""; setCookie(json,-1) } ``` ## javascriptcookie `navigator.cookieEnabled` `cookie``true``cookie``false` `navigator` `JavaScript``navigator` ## javascriptcookie 1.HttpOnly cookieHttpOnlyjscookieXSS 2.HttpOnly ```javascript response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "cookiename=value;Path=/;Domain=domainvalue;Max-Age=seconds;HTTPOnly"); ``` ```bash //httpcookie response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "uid=112; Path=/; HttpOnly"); ``` ```bash //httpscookie response.setHeader("Set-Cookie", "uid=112; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly"); ``` ## WebStorage `WebStorage``cookie` #### WebStorage 1.`cookie` 2. `HTML5``WebStorage``API``localStorage``sessionStorage` ### localStoragesessionStorage ##### 1. `localStorage``localStorage``localStorage` `sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage``sessionStorage` ##### 2. `localStorage``sessionStorage`5MB ##### 3. `localStorage``sessionStorage` ##### 4. `localStorage``sessionStorage``ECMAScript``JSON``stringify``parse` ##### 5. ```bash localStoragewindow.localStorage sessionStoragewindow.sessionStorage ``` ##### 6. `localStorage`+ `sessionStorage` ## WebStorage - `cookie`4KB`WebStorage`5MB - `WebStorage``cookie` - `sessionStorage` - `WebStorage` - `WebStorage``HTTP header``cookie` - `WebStorage``cookie` ```bash setItem(key, value) getItem(key) value removeItem(key) clear() key(index) key ```

Post.title: Hello Blog
Post._content:
## 


## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "helloBlog"
```

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

### Deploy to remote sites


## js
 ### 1. js
 #### js()
 ![avatar](../images/hycommunite.png)

 - `js`,
 - 

### 2.:hybrid(file),
 1. `ajax`(`http`):,
 2. `js`,

#### schema 
`schema`
eg
`schema``"weixin://"`
`QQ schema``"QQ://"`
#### schema

#### 
 ```javascript
 var iframe = document.createElement('iframe')
 iframe.style.display = 'none'
 //iframeschema
 iframe.src = 'weixin://dl/scan?k1=v1&k2=v2&k3=v3&callback=_weixin_scan_callback'    
 

 var body = document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]
 body.appendchild(iframe)
 setTimeout(function(){
     body.removeChild(iframe)  //iframe
     iframe = null
 })

//callback
 window['_weixin_scan_callback'] = function(result){
     alert(alert)
 }
```

#### 

 ```javascript
 
 window.invoke.share({title:'xxx',content:'xxx'},function(result){
     if(result.errno === 0) {
         alert('')
     }else{
         alert('',result.message)
     }
 })
//
 function invokeShare(data,callback){
     _invoke('share',data,callback)
 }
 //
 function invokeLogin(data,callback){
    _invoke('login',data,callback)
 }
 //
 function invokeScan(data,callback){
     _invoke('scan',data,callback)
 }
//
 window.invoke = {
     share:invokeShare,
     login:invokeLogin,
     scan:invokeScan
 }

 function _invoke(action,data,callback){
     var schema = 'myapp://utils'
     schema += '/' + action
     schema += '?a=a'
     var key
     for(var key in data){     //data={title:'xxx',content:'xxx'}
         if(data.hasOwnProperty(key)){
             schema += '&' + key + '=' + data[key]
         }
     }
 }

 //callback
 var callbackName = ''
 if(typeof callback === 'string'){
     callbackName = callback
 }else{
     callbackName = action + Date.now()
     window[callbackName] = callback
 }

 schema += '&callback='+ callbackName
 //iframeschema
 N



 (function(window,undefined){
     function _invoke(action,data,callback){
         //schema
         var schema = 'myapp://utils' + action
         schema += '?a=a' //
         window.invoke = {
             share:function(data,callback){
                 _invoke('share',data,callback)
             },
             scan:function(data,callback){
                 _invoke('scan',data,callback)
             },
             login:function(data,callback){
                 _invoke('login',data,callback)
             }
         }
     }
 })
```
#### 


## 
1.  
2. `schema`
3. `schema`
4.

Post.title: CRN
Post._content:
## 
### 
	1.	h5:sob:
	2.	CRN 
### 
	1.	YY
	2.	API

## 

### . 
RNCRNAPI

### . 

#### 
```javascript
constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.state = {
        showInit: true
    }
}
componentDidMount() {
    InteractionManager.runAfterInteractions(() => {
        this.setState({
            showInit: false
        })
    })
}
render() {
    {this.state.showInit ?
    <View><LoadingView style={{ flex: 1 }} /></View>:
    <ViewPort>
        <HeaderView page={this} title={''} />
        <View></View>
    </ViewPort>
    }
}
componentDidMount() {
    const { dir = 'flight', type,index,curCity = {} } = this.props
    InteractionManager.runAfterInteractions(()=>{
        this.props.events.reqCityList({
            dir,
            type,
            index,
            curCity
        })
    })
}
```
 `RN InteractionManager`
tip:`dispatch``dispatch``state`

#### 

#####  1. `ScrollView`
```bash
 
scrollTo({ x: 0, animated: true })  animatedtruex  
tipscrollTosetTimeout
```

##### 2. `ListView`
  
eg
`ios`
```bash

1. onContentSizeChange
scrollTo
2. scrollRenderAheadDistance

```
```javascript
<ListView
    ref={listView => this._listView = listView}
    dataSource={this.state.dataSource}
    onContentSizeChange={this.onContentSizeChange.bind(this)}
    renderRow={this.renderRow.bind(this)}
    renderSectionHeader={this.renderSectionHeader}
    initialListSize={20}//
    scrollRenderAheadDistance={this.state.height}
    pageSize={100} //
    />
```


##### 3. `CRNListView`
`ListView`

ios:triumph:
`SectionList FlatList`
`listview``list`

```javascript
<FlatList
    initialNumToRender={6}//
    maxToRenderPerBatch={6}
    getItemLayout={this.getItemLayout}// scrollTo
    horizontal={this.props.horizontal}
    keyExtractor={(item)=>item.showMonth}
    ref={flatList => this._flatList = flatList}
    data={this.state.monthInfo}
    renderItem={this.getMonthView.bind(this)}/>
```
 `initialScrollIndex ` 
    `getItemLayout(data, index)``index`-1
 `scrollToIndex scrollToOffset`

#### 
- `View``cpu`
-  
-  `a.b.c.d``async await` `promise``then catch``try catch`

```javascript
constructor(props) {

        this.setState({
            showInit: false
        })

}
render() {
    {this.state.showInit ?
    <View><LoadingView style={{ flex: 1 }} /></View>:
    <ViewPort>
        <HeaderView page={this} title={''} />

    </ViewPort>

}
componentDidMount() {
    const { dir = 'flight', type,index,curCity = {} } = this.props
    InteractionManager.runAfterInteractions(()=>{

}
```

title: CRN
date: 2020-03-10 14:54:07
categories: React Native
tags: React Native

1.	`<textInput>` `TextInput``padding``iOS``padding: 0``underlineColorAndroid="transparent"``padding: 0 `
2.	 crn`ellipsizeMode='tail' numberOfLines={1}``<Text>``style`
3.	`borderRadius``borderBottomLeftRadius``borderBottomRightRadiusborderTopLeftRadiusborderTopRightRadius`
4.	`justifyContent: center`!
5.	`iphone6``750px`
```javascript
const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('window');
let WIDTH = width, HEIGHT = height;
const rem = (a) => { return a * (WIDTH / 750); };
```
6.	`<Text>` `Text``View``background`: `Text``backgroundColor:'transparent'`
7.	`crn``width``height``padding``border`
8.	`Image`
`Source{uri:string}` url
resizeMode`('cover', 'contain', 'stretch')` `Mode`eg`resizeMode: Image.resizeMode.cover`
  
9.	`<SpriteImage>` crop: dprdpr11.5234iosdpr23@3@2
```javascript
<SpriteImage style={styles.spritePic}
source={{ uri: PixelRatio.get() === 3 ? 'https://pic.c-ctrip.com/VacationH5Pic/taocan/sdp/n_banner/un_banner@3.png' : 'https://pic.c-ctrip.com/VacationH5Pic/taocan/sdp/n_banner/un_banner.png', imageSize: { width: 169, height: 167 }, crop }}
>
</SpriteImage>
```

10.	`320``width === 320` 
11.	`1px``border`: `border: 1 / PixelRatio.get()`
12.	`<TouchableOpacity>``activeOpacity={1}``<View>`style`<View>`
`<TouchableOpacity>`

13. `crn` `react native``pt`,`px``PixelRatio`
```javascript
import {PixelRatio} from 'react-native';
const pt2px = pt=>PixelRatio.getPixelSizeForLayoutSize(pt);
const px2pt = px=>PixelRatio.roundToNearestPixel(px);
```

14. +
```javascript
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Text, View, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';

export default class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <View style={styles.container}>
          <View style = {[styles.btn_one,{backgroundColor: '#fff'}]}>
            <Text style = {styles.textblock}>+</Text>
            <View style = {styles.cateory}></View>
          </View>
          <View style = {styles.btn_one}>
            <Text style = {styles.textblock}></Text>
          </View>
           <View style = {styles.btn_one}>
            <Text style = {styles.textblock}></Text>
          </View>
      </View>
    );
  }
}
const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    backgroundColor: '#53b8fb',
    height: 100,
    flexDirection: "row",
    borderTopLeftRadius: 7,
    borderTopRightRadius: 7,
    marginTop: 100,
  },
  btn_one: {
    flex: 1,
    borderRadius: 10,
  },

cateory: {
 height:0,
 width:0,
 borderBottomWidth: 100,
 borderLeftWidth: 50,
 borderRightWidth: 50,
 borderStyle: 'solid',
 borderBottomColor: '#f00',
 borderLeftColor: 'transparent',
 borderRightColor: 'transparent',
 marginRight: 10,
 transform: [{skewX: '45deg'},{rotateX:'180deg'},{rotateY:'180deg'}],
 position: 'absolute',
 bottom: 0,
 left: 0,
 },
textblock: {
    color: '#fff',
    fontSize: 14,
  }
});
```
